title: Pumpkin Biryani with Pistachios
directions: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add the fennel, onion, and garlic and sauté until the onions are golden. Add the pumpkin, cayenne pepper, and quinoa with half the pistachios and sauté for 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in 3 cups of hot water with the salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Cook, stirring occasionally until the quinoa is tender, the pumpkin is cooked, and all the moisture is absorbed.
Serve hot, garnished with remaining pistachios and parsley.
ingredients: 1 pound pumpkin, peeled, seeded, and cut into 3/4-inch cubes
1 1/2 cups quinoa, well rinsed and drained
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
